<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_sow_chg.ChangeRequestRelatedListProblemItemFilter</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Implements extension point global.RelatedListItemCandidateFilter</description> <name>ChangeRequestRelatedListProblemItemFilter</name> <script><![CDATA[var ChangeRequestRelatedListProblemItemFilter = Class.create(); ChangeRequestRelatedListProblemItemFilter.prototype = { getFilterQuery: function(tableName, parentFieldName, parentRecordSysId, referencedFieldName) { return "active=true^rfcISEMPTY"; },
handles: function(extensionPointKey){ return extensionPointKey == "CHANGE_REQUEST_PROBLEM_RELATED_QUERY_FILTER"; },
type: 'ChangeRequestRelatedListProblemItemFilter' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-07-20 10:17:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>293f08350b701110fef78a8db777b2ce</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ChangeRequestRelatedListProblemItemFilter</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Change Management for Service Operations Workspace" source="sn_sow_chg">bccbdbb023213010785ddc1756bf6579</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Change Management for Service Operations Workspace">bccbdbb023213010785ddc1756bf6579</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_293f08350b701110fef78a8db777b2ce</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-07-20 10:17:25</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
